author: 984evgeniyam
title: Lovely serviced apartment in South Kensington, London
text:
I was pleased with the apartment. It was exactly what I needed for a group of three friends. We had a comfortable stay, cooked breakfast at the kitchenette, which had everything we needed. The beds and the sofa bed were very comfortable, the hotel and the apartment was at highest cleanliness standard.
The check in process was straight forward, the staff were smiley and helpful, ready to answer all of my 1000 questions. It also was in excellent location with 3 minute walk to the underground, easy access to any part of the city.
Thank you, Citandines, you did well!
Room Tip: We had 2 twin beds upstairs - you could keep them together if you are a couple or move them away fro... See more room tips
